CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Desert relative to Silverwood Forest?
SRP.A: Sunstone Desert is {above} Silverwood Forest in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Delta relative to Sunstone Desert?
SRP.A: Golden Delta is {below} Sunstone Desert in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverwood Forest relative to Sunstone Desert?
SRP.A: Silverwood Forest is {below} Sunstone Desert in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total construction starts?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Golden Delta}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total construction starts?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sunstone Desert}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Golden Delta's maximum Construction Starts in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Golden Delta's maximum Construction Starts is in {1984}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverwood Forest's minimum Construction Starts in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverwood Forest's minimum Construction Starts is in {1974}.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1983, did the total Construction Starts experience a larger or smaller change than between 1979 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total construction starts between 1978 and 1983 was {larger} than between 1979 and 1983.

NC.Q: Was the total Construction Starts in 1975 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total construction starts in 1975 was {lower} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1983, was the average total Construction Starts higher or lower than between 1976 and 1979?
NC.A: The average total construction starts between 1982 and 1983 was {higher} than between 1976 and 1979.

NC.Q: Was the total Construction Starts in 1979 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total construction starts in 1979 was {lower} than in 1983.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Golden Delta} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Silverwood Forest and Golden Delta first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Silverwood Forest and Golden Delta first exchanged leading positions in {1980}.
